metadata.synopsis: Ketheric leaves after delegating Z'rell to deal with the players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Players attack Ketheric in MOO_Execution or disrupt the scene while it is under way.

0.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
0.context: NodeContext: 'rest in turmoil' - spellcasting combat VB - ( rekwiˈɛsk-ænt in tuː.mʌl.tu )

1.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
1.text: The first time I died, it took an army to put me in the ground. What chance do you have?
1.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

3.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
3.text: What is your name, True Soul?
3.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

10.speaker: Player
10.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

6.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
6.text: You. Impossible. You should never have come back here. Z'rell - kill this wastrel.

17.speaker: Player
17.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

12.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
12.text: Funny - you know, I don't know why I asked. Z'rell: Kill this fool.
12.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

13.speaker: Player
13.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

2.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
2.text: I suppose it doesn't. Z'rell: Kill this fool.
2.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

16.speaker: Player
16.text: You can call me 'The Death of Ketheric Thorm.'
16.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

19.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
19.text: Funny. And sad. Z'rell: Kill this fool.
19.context: NodeContext: Maybe a bit of comedy here. 'Funny' (stern). 'And sad' (mockery). 'Zrel: kill him' (dead seriousness)

4.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
4.context: NodeContext: 'embrace death' - spellcasting V|B in combat. mɔrt̪əm äm plek-tɛɚɪs

7.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
7.context: NodeContext: '(return) to dust' - combat VB (add pul.u̯is)

8.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
8.text: Death comes to all, and all that die come to me.
8.context: NodeContext: 'spirits from the grave' - spellcasting VB in combat. spiː.ri.tus eks seˈpulkɾo

11.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
11.text: My army will march. The city will burn. Death's design will be complete.
11.context: NodeContext: 'spirits from the grave' - spellcasting VB in combat. spiː.ri.tus eks seˈpulkɾo

14.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
14.text: Every battle I fight provides fresh recruits for my army of the dead. Soon, we will be legion.
14.context: NodeContext: 'spirits from the grave' - spellcasting VB in combat. spiː.ri.tus eks seˈpulkɾo

15.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
15.text: I don't know who you think you are to disturb these proceedings, but I will exact your contrition from your flesh.
15.context: NodeContext: 'spirits from the grave' - spellcasting VB in combat. spiː.ri.tus eks seˈpulkɾo

18.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
18.context: NodeContext: 'spirits from the grave' - spellcasting VB in combat. spiː.ri.tus eks seˈpulkɾo
